page.title: 03Sileby
page.content: Sileby hasn't got alot to offer for children of our age.It has a few playing areas and a park that people go to but most of the rides have been vandalised.There is a library that is popular and a pub called the Free Trade where children are allowed to play as long as they are with an adult.{This is how I think Sileby {could be improved. We're a long way from the sea so a Lido would be great.The nearest Leisure Centre is 4 miles away in Loughborough. I would like to see more clubs and activities like gym clubs and horse riding and swimming clubs. I wish Sileby had more things to go and see like museums and a big super market or an antique shop. By Lisa Wills age 10
